General.Name: HORNG SHIUE HOLDING Co Ltd
General.Description: HORNG SHIUE HOLDING Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, processing, and trading of automotive sheet metal stamping dies and gauges in Mainland China and internationally. It also offers car-body sheet metal dies, including press die comprising sheet metal molds, injection molds, rubber molds, and forging molds for craft equipment in car parts manufacturing. In addition, the company provides after sales services, such as technique consulting. HORNG SHIUE HOLDING Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands.
General.Address: The Grand Pavilion Commercial Centre, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1208
